aboutMetaDescription: Wakapadi connects people‚Äîlocals, travelers, and anonymous users‚Äîthrough free walking tours, local insight, and safe meetups.
aboutSubtitle: Free walking tours + safe connections, designed for real travel days.
aboutBodyIntro: Wakapadi helps you discover free walking tours and connect with people nearby‚Äîlocals, travelers, and anonymous users‚Äîwithout the friction of sign-ups or complex onboarding. It‚Äôs built for quick decisions, safe meetups, and better local experiences.
aboutSummaryBody: Wakapadi keeps planning lightweight: browse tours, meet people nearby, and keep control of your visibility‚Äîall in a few taps.
aboutVisionBody: We focus on the essentials: reliable tour discovery, thoughtful safety guidance, and human‚Äëfirst connections. The product is intentionally lightweight so you can spend less time planning and more time exploring.
aboutVisionListOne: Curated free tour discovery across cities
aboutVisionListTwo: Anonymous‚Äëfirst chat with control over visibility
aboutVisionListThree: Safety prompts that encourage smart meetups
aboutHowBody: We keep the flow simple and fast so you can get from idea to plan without friction.
aboutHowListOne: Search free tours by city and browse highlights
aboutHowListTwo: Chat anonymously with people nearby if you want to connect
aboutHowListThree: Meet in public places and share plans responsibly‚Äîlocals, travelers, or anonymous users.
aboutSafetyBody: Wakapadi is not a dating platform. Always meet in public, stay aware, and trust your instincts.
aboutJoinBody: Have feedback, partnership ideas, or a tour provider to suggest? Email us at
contactSubtitle: Questions, partnerships, or feedback? We respond quickly.
contactHeroBody: Tell us how we can help. Share feedback, report an issue, or explore partnerships ‚Äî we‚Äôll get back with clear next steps.
contactWaysBody: Pick the path that matches your request. We route every message to the right team.
contactSupportBody: Product questions, account help, or safety concerns.
contactResponseBody: We typically respond within 24‚Äì48 hours on business days.
contactFaqOneQ: How do I report a problem with a tour?
contactFaqOneA: Use the form and select ‚ÄúComplaint‚Äù so we can triage quickly.
contactFaqTwoQ: Can I request a city or tour provider?
contactFaqTwoA: Yes ‚Äî choose ‚ÄúSuggestion‚Äù and include the city and provider name.
contactFaqThreeQ: I need help with a login or chat issue.
contactFaqThreeA: Select ‚ÄúInquiry‚Äù and add any screenshots or details that help us reproduce it.
contactFormNote: We only use your details to respond to this request.

privacySubtitle: We collect the minimum data needed to run the service.
privacyIntro: Wakapadi is privacy‚Äëfirst. We use anonymous accounts and store only what‚Äôs required to deliver core features like messaging, notifications, and tour discovery.
privacySummaryBody: We design the product to work without personal details. When data is needed, we keep it limited, encrypted in transit, and accessible to you.
privacyGdprBody: You can request access to, correction of, or deletion of your data at any time. Contact
privacyRightAccess: ‚Ä¢ Access the data we have about you
privacyRightWithdraw: ‚Ä¢ Withdraw consent or stop using the service
privacyDataBody: Anonymous identifiers, basic profile preferences (if you add them), message content, and usage signals for product stability.
privacyUseBody: To deliver messaging, notifications, tour discovery, and to improve reliability and safety.
privacySharingBody: We don‚Äôt sell your data. We share only with service providers who help operate Wakapadi (e.g., hosting, analytics) under strict agreements.
privacyRetentionBody: We keep data only as long as needed for the service. You can delete your account and data at any time.
privacySecurityBody: We use industry‚Äëstandard security practices and review access regularly.
error404Body: We couldn‚Äôt find that page. Try searching or return home.

error500Body: An unexpected error occurred. Try again or contact support.
errorMotivation: Discover tours and meet people ‚Äî your next adventure awaits.
termsSubtitle: Simple, clear rules to keep Wakapadi safe and helpful.
termsIntroOne: Wakapadi lets travelers find free tours and connect with people nearby. By using the service, you agree to use it respectfully and legally.
termsIntroTwo: These terms may change as the product evolves. We‚Äôll update this page and note major changes when possible.
termsSummaryBody: Use Wakapadi respectfully, meet safely, and don‚Äôt misuse the service. If you do, we may restrict access.
termsAcceptableBody: To keep the community safe, you must not:
termsAcceptableListOne: ‚Ä¢ Harass, threaten, or discriminate against others
termsAcceptableListThree: ‚Ä¢ Share illegal, harmful, or unsafe content
termsAcceptableListFour: ‚Ä¢ Use Wakapadi for unauthorized commercial solicitation
termsAcceptableFooter: Violations may result in account restriction or removal.
termsUpdatesBody: We may update these terms as features change. Continued use means you accept the updated terms.
termsEligibilityBody: You must be able to form a legal agreement and comply with local laws to use Wakapadi.
termsSafetyBody: Meet in public places and use common sense. Wakapadi does not verify users or guarantee safety.
termsContentBody: You are responsible for the content you share. Don‚Äôt post illegal, harmful, or private information.
termsLiabilityBody: Wakapadi is provided as‚Äëis. We are not responsible for tour provider changes or user interactions.
termsTerminationBody: We may restrict or remove access if you violate these terms or harm others.
termsContactBody: Questions about these terms? Reach us at
cookieSubtitle: We use minimal cookies to keep Wakapadi running smoothly.
cookieIntro: Cookies help us remember preferences, keep you signed in anonymously, and ensure core features work reliably.
cookieEssential: Essential: required for basic site functionality
cookieAnalytics: Analytics: aggregated usage signals to improve the experience
cookieSummaryBody: Cookies help keep your anonymous session consistent and the interface responsive.
cookieManageBody: You can block cookies in your browser settings, but some features may not work correctly.
cookieRetentionBody: Most cookies are session‚Äëbased or short‚Äëlived; we minimize long‚Äëterm storage.
legalSubtitle: Company and contact details for Wakapadi.
legalIntro: This page provides legal contact and company information for Wakapadi.
legalEntityBody: Wakapadi is operated by a private company. Update these details with your official legal entity before launch.
legalDisclaimerBody: Wakapadi aggregates public tour information and provides a messaging platform. We don‚Äôt guarantee availability or quality of third‚Äëparty services.
legalJurisdictionBody: Local laws may apply depending on your location. Replace this section with your legal jurisdiction.

whoisSafetyWarning: For your safety, meet in public places, let someone know your plans, and trust your instincts. Wakapadi can‚Äôt verify users.
whoisAllowLocationBody: We use approximate location to show travelers nearby. Your exact coordinates are not shared publicly ‚Äî only approximate distance. You can also enter a city manually.
